backend/main.mo: Defines actor with data types and stores for documents, analysis results, gender/geo distributions, intentions, and exposes log management and data-reset APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries for various frontend files describing their roles in routing, pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and layout with header, footer, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/BrandEmotionChar: Computes and visualizes per-brand emotion distributions using mock analysis and Recharts with dataset-aware empty states.
frontend/src/components/CleaningLogPanel: Displays latest data-cleaning logs with status icons and expandable list, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ConfusionMatrixC: Validates and renders a confusion matrix heatmap with color scaling, handling missing or invalid dataset states.
frontend/src/components/DatasetUploadSta: Shows dataset upload progress and states including parsing, validating, uploading, completion, and errors.
frontend/src/components/EmotionChart.tsx: Generates a bar chart of emotion frequencies from analyzed documents, with empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/EmotionDistribut: Creates a pie chart and frequency table for emotion distribution, including dataset and insufficient-data fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/EnsembleComparis: Renders a radar chart comparing three ensemble models across precision, recall, F1, and accuracy, converting metrics to validated percentages with a custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying attribution text with a link and heart icon.
frontend/src/components/GenderEmotionCha: Displays a bar chart of emotion distribution by gender, handling loading, missing data, and visualization state.
frontend/src/components/GeoEmotionMap.ts: Generates a geographic emotion intensity heatmap by filtering valid Indonesian regions and validating matrix data.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a top navigation bar with theme toggle, responsive menu, and navigation links based on current route.
frontend/src/components/IntentionBrandCo: Shows a stacked bar chart of purchase intention levels grouped by brand using aggregated document data.
frontend/src/components/IntentionDemogra: Renders gender and geographic stacked bar charts summarizing purchase intention segments derived from documents.
frontend/src/components/IntentionTrendCh: Fetches documents, computes intention trend time‑series per level, and renders a multi‑line historical trend chart with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/MarketingMixRada: Computes 8P Marketing Mix scores and displays them in a radar chart with validation and fallback UI for missing or insufficient data.
frontend/src/components/MarketingRadarCh: Generates marketing funnel metric scores and visualizes them in a radar chart with state handling for no or insufficient data.
frontend/src/components/ModelPerformance: Converts model precision, recall, and F1 metrics to percentages and renders a bar chart with a custom tooltip and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/PsychoSocialHeat: Computes a psycho‑social score matrix across UTAUT2 dimensions and emotions and renders a heatmap with validation and visualization state checks.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseIntentio: Aggregates purchase intention levels into a distribution and displays them as a pie chart with loading and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/RecentAnalysis.t: Displays the five most recent documents with mock emotion analysis badges and previews.
frontend/src/components/TemporalEvolutio: Groups documents into periods and visualizes emotion frequency changes over time using a multi-line chart.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, uploading, and processing documents using the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/datasetIngestion.ts: Parses and validates CSV datasets, normalizes headers, extracts required fields, and derives optional intention metadata.
frontend/src/lib/icReplicaErrors.ts: Provides helpers to extract IC replica rejection details, detect canister-stopped errors, and map upload errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMetrics.ts: Computes 0-100 marketing funnel metric scores per document and averages them for radar‑chart use.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMixMetrics.ts: Scores documents across the 8P marketing mix factors using keyword heuristics for radar‑chart visualization.
frontend/src/lib/mockData.ts: Contains EV brand detection and a mock emotion analysis generator producing heuristic emotion scores.
frontend/src/lib/psychoSocialMetrics.ts: Classifies emotion categories and computes UTAUT2 psycho‑social scores for documents using deterministic keyword rules.
frontend/src/lib/purchaseIntentionAggreg: Aggregates purchase‑intention levels, averages, brand distributions, and mock time‑trend data from document text.
frontend/src/lib/purchaseIntentionDeriva: Provides deterministic utilities to compute purchase intention scores and levels from text, including hashing, keyword adjustments, and validation helpers.
frontend/src/lib/reportPdfExport.ts: Implements browser-based PDF export by triggering print dialog and managing document title, plus a helper to check export availability.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReport.ts: Generates strategic reports from document analyses, including emotion, psychosocial, marketing, and brand metrics, producing summaries and recommendations.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReportLocale.t: Defines EN/ID UI labels and priority mappings, along with localized templates for strategic report text generation.
frontend/src/lib/visualizationState.ts: Provides utilities for visualization state, numeric sanitation, safe array/matrix access, and emotion label normalization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Renders the emotion analysis dashboard with filtering, charts, document management, and dataset status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page for text and file uploads, dataset ingestion, and navigation to analysis with various emotion and marketing visualizations.
frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx: Metrics dashboard displaying model and ensemble confusion matrices, performance charts, and dataset change notifications with reset controls.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseIntentionPage: Computes purchase intention stats from documents and displays intention charts, correlations, trends, and demographics.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings interface for toggling model options, ensemble defaults, thresholds, and adaptive features with save feedback.
frontend/src/pages/StrategicRecommendati: Generates strategic recommendation reports with localization, export options, and document-based report rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, components, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, architectural notes, issues, and existing features for dashboard visualizations and strategic reporting. Includes heatmap, radar charts, upload pipeline requirements, localization, and known rendering/upload issues.
